seoAttributes.description: The Varia™ RTL515 bike radar & tail light provides alerts to warn of vehicles approaching from behind, as well provide daylight visibility up to 1 mile.
seoAttributes.seoKeywords: varia, bike, rearview, rear view, tail light, radar, safety
seoAttributes.seoTitle: Garmin Varia RTL515 | Bike radar with tail light
seoAttributes.title: Varia™ RTL515/516

seo.ogDescription: Varia™ RCT715 is a rearview radar & tail light with a camera that records your bike ride, as well as displays approaching vehicles on a compatible Garmin device.
seo.title: Garmin Varia™ RCT715 | Rearview Bike Radar

010-02475-00.shippingDisclaimer: Ready to ship in 1–3 business days.

specs.Battery life:
4 hours solid or night flash
5 hours peloton
6 hours day flash (all with 1080p recording)
specs.Camera control: Garmin Edge® bike computers, select Garmin smartwatches and Varia™ app
specs.Light modes: Solid, peloton, night flash, day flash
specs.Lumens: 20 solid, 8 peloton, 21 night flash, 65 day flash
specs.Varia™ app compatibility: radar display, camera control and video transfer
